description: Our apartment a well curated  beauty in the heart of Astoria.  We have many fantastic restaurants and bars within walking distance.  Quick trip (5 stops on the N/Q) to Manhattan. Located in a gorgeous and quiet prewar building, this apartment is the perfect place to relax and recharge during your visit.
name: Charming Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment
review:
Nos gustó mucho el apartamento de Caleb, es tal cual se muestra en las fotos.

Tiene una buena ubicación ya que está a pocos minutos de Manhattan.

Caleb fue muy atento!
